mapper.sql: select distinct on (cpb.prm_no) cpb.prm_no, cpb.dc_ccd, cpb.dc_val, cpb.max_dc_amt, cpb.min_pur_amt, ccb.cpn_kind_cd, ccb.degr_ccd from cc_prm_base cpb inner join cc_cpn_issue cci on cpb.prm_no = cci.prm_no inner join cc_prm_aply_tgt cpat on cpb.prm_no = cpat.prm_no inner join cc_cpn_base ccb on cpb.prm_no = ccb.prm_no where cpb.use_yn = 'Y' and cpb.prm_kind_cd = '20' and case when cpb.prm_priod_ccd = '10' then now() between cpb.prm_strt_dt and cpb.prm_end_dt + interval '1 day' when cpb.prm_priod_ccd = '20' then now() between cci.sys_reg_dtime and cci.sys_reg_dtime + interval '1 day' * cpb.prm_std_dd else true end and cci.cpn_use_dt is null and cci.mbr_no = #{mbrNo} and cpat.use_yn = 'Y' and cpat.aply_tgt_ccd = '10' and ccb.cpn_kind_cd = #{cpnKindCd} and ccb.degr_ccd = #{degrCcd}
